marklogic.body:
Phhhhhht! Sprayed you.
Somebody has to pay for all that and the quagmire of ObamaCare will have to be paid for dearly. It is truly redistribution of wealth. And we're losing our wealth. And its no coincidence, I'm thinking, that a radical President shoved the most radical piece of legislation down our throats at the worst possible time, AND by hook or crook. Obama suks...but you know that. What kind of a pony do you have in this race, derailed? Why are you so hot for Obamanism? Are you jobless? Living the government? Or are you a successful Bleeding heart, money all safely stashed offshore and Cheering for serfdom? Why?
